name: A R T C U B E
slogan: Your art world in one place - discover, connect & buy
description:
ARTCUBE is a virtual private members club for the art world to discover, connect & buy - both virtually and at events in London & NYC.

Expand your network of like-minded people on a social and professional level. From artists to collectors, curators, gallerists and everyone who is enthusiastic about art – ARTCUBE unites the art world. 

Be the first in the know! Combining a discovery platform with a social network and an online marketplace, ARTCUBE provides members with a unique way to fully engage in all aspects of the art world. With an expertly curated selection of contemporary fine art, we offer an unparalleled selection to discover, share and buy.

team.name: David Reymondet
team.bioHtml: Co-Founder A R T C U B E • Investment experience at @Macquarie Bank & @J.P. Morgan • Studied at @University of St Andrews & @Middlebury College

team.name: Melissa Sueren
team.bioHtml: Co-Founder & CEO at A R T C U B E

jobs.title: Full-Stack Developer
jobs.description:
Come and join A R T C U B E, one of the fastest growing art companies. We're a highly motivated team with a strong advisory board and looking for someone passionate about joining our art revolution. You will directly be responsible for building our online platform and have the freedom to assemble your own team of additional developers.

Must haves: 
+Front-end – bootstrap, less/sass, javascript and tooling (gulp etc)
+Back-end – experience with a modern MVC framework (i.e Django, RoR, Laravel etc)
+Portfolio/github of previous work
+Leadership skills with the ability to build your own team of developers 
+Ability to think outside the cube
+An interest in the creative fields
+Ability to communicate technological processes to non-tech individuals (advisors, investors, etc.)
+Ability to build an iOS app (option to add a UX designer/front-end developer to complement you right from the beginning)

Desirable if you also have experience with: 
+ Modern MV* (i.e Angular/react)
+Gaming applications & virtual/augmented reality applications (for non-core products)
+Previous start-ups or SMEs

Last, but not least, you must have at least some interest in e-commerce, artificial intelligence, and the creative fields.

We offer: 
+Freedom and autonomy to steer the technical direction of our platform, building your own team from the ground up
+Working among a diverse and talented group of individuals
+Flexible hours 
+Access to social activities in the global art world

Location is not fixed with potential to work in New York or London (or a combination of the two).

Compensation includes equity and benefits.

ALL INQUIRIES FROM RECRUITERS AND DEV SHOPS WILL BE IGNORED

jobs.title: Instagram art curation & data analytics
jobs.description:
We're one of the largest art curators on Instagram and are looking for someone to help with the curation of our own account (instagram.com/artcube), for help with clients, as well as analyzing art trends.

Requirements:
+Advanced understanding of Instagram
+Data analytical skills to calculate and analyze art trends
+Strong attention to detail
+Interest in contemporary art & design
+General understanding of art market trends
+Experience with MS Office

Good to have:
+Art History & Curatorial Experience
+Simple coding skills

This is a remote intern position that can turn into a part-time or full-time position if the fit is right. The position has a lot of room to grow for someone interested in the online art market. Flexible working hours. Pay based on experience & skill set.
